_header: Whoso is wounded or ill beat
_description: Dietary constraints for a wounded man — three couplets

TokyoTak46.Transcription:
Qwo so is wounded or ille beteGarlek nore oynons may he non
                    eteNor butter nor chese eyre hard nor nescheNore fish but of the water
                    fressheNor fruyt nor fresh flesh may he ete nonNor touche woman tille
                    he may gon
TokyoTak46.Attributed Title: How a seik man schal dyate hym
